Title: SilverPoiMap
Description: SilverPoiMap provides interactive searching and management of Points of Interest. It is a Facebook client application which allow you to connect to your Facebook account and manage your points and profile.

Project Description

SilverPoiMap provides interactive searching and management of Points of Interest. It is a Facebook client application which allow you to connect to your Facebook account and manage your points and profile.


Project Goals

•Points of Interest Management
•Facebook Integration
•Personalized Tour Planning
•Personalized Points of Interest

Project Requirements

  • Visual Studio 2010
  • Microsoft .Net Framework 4
  • Silverlight 3
  • Microsoft SQL Server 2008
  • ADO.NET Entity Framework
  • Facebook Toolkit

SilverPoiMap Database


SilverPoiMap Application












Technologies

Servers: IIS, Microsoft SQL Server 2008
Development Tools: Microsoft Visual Studio 2010
Other Technologies: Microsoft Silverlight 3, Microsoft Expression Studio 3, ASP.NET, C#, WCF, ADO.NET Entity Framework,
Bing Maps Silverlight Control, Facebook Toolkit
